app.title: LiteNote
app.setup_desc: Set your PIN (numbers only) to protect your notes
app.warning: Please remember your PIN. Data cannot be recovered if lost.
app.reset_warning_desc: This will delete ALL your notes permanently. This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.install_desc: Install LiteNote for a better experience
settings.install_manual_desc: Due to browser restrictions, please follow these steps to install manually:
settings.install_chrome_desc: Click the 'Install' icon in the address bar, or 'Install LiteNote' in the menu.
settings.install_safari_desc: Tap the 'Share' button below, then select 'Add to Home Screen'.

messages.pin_min_length: PIN must be at least 4 digits
messages.pin_same: New PIN cannot be the same as old PIN
messages.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note? This action cannot be undone.

about.title: About LiteNote
about.desc_1: LiteNote is a minimalist, privacy-focused note-taking app.
about.desc_2: Your data is end-to-end encrypted and stored securely on your device, never uploaded to the cloud.
about.sponsor: If you like this tool, consider buying me a coffee ☕

editor.select_note_hint: Select or create a note from the sidebar
